Interest: for the moment we need only to control if the system is operating correctly
CustomizedApplication: control via bluethoot for the solenoid valves

Actuators: Fan Speed, Water Pump, Lamps, irrigation Timers and Flow rates
AdditionalParameters: Temperature, Humidity, Water tank level, Leaf color (via a camera)
SoftwareUsed: one of the many systems we use :-  NAAVA walls have their own system
Interest: Flow Rates of Irrigation , Water levels in tanks, Photos of Foliage recording overall appearance
